sentences.english: The most common torque need for the upper incisors during orthodontic treatment is increased palatal root torque.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的扭矩需要切牙正畸治疗中增加腭根扭矩。

sentences.english: And to her it seemed that the angle of his jaw had changed; its pitch had become unpleasantly aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 在她眼里他那下腭已棱角毕露，开合时咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: The perichondrium of the cartilage is only partially contiguous with the periosteum of the crests.
sentences.chinese: 软骨膜与腭嵴的骨膜之间只是部分延续。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the use of botulinum toxin (BTX) A in the treatment of palatal myoclonus objective tinnitus (PMOT).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肉毒毒素A对腭肌阵挛源性耳鸣的治疗作用。

sentences.english: The midpalatal sutural expansion is a process of bone tissue regeneration and fibrous tissue repair.
sentences.chinese: 腭中缝改建的过程是纤维修复和骨组织再生过程。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutical effect of uvula - preserving uvulopalatopharyngoplasty ( UPPP ).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察保留悬壅垂腭咽成形术的临床效果。

sentences.english: No patient demonstrated clinically significant postoperative velopharyngeal incompetence after 14 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 术后14周，没有患者出现显著的术后腭咽闭锁不全。

sentences.english: The study group was furthermore divided into 2 groups according to the execution of SPAL.
sentences.chinese: 试验组根据是否行蝶腭动脉结扎术再分成两组。

sentences.english: A primary clinical study proves that repairing of the hard palate cleft can improve the velopharyngeal function.
sentences.chinese: 初步研究认为腭板骨缺损修复能改善腭咽闭合。

sentences.english: The vomer itself rests on the maxillary and palatine crest.
sentences.chinese: 犁骨位于上颌骨及腭嵴之上。

sentences.english: The sufficient hardness of the mouth opener can confront with the teeth of the upper and lower jaw.
sentences.chinese: 开口器的硬度足以撑开患者牙关紧闭的上下腭。

sentences.english: Does an oral appliance reduce palatal flutter and tongue base snoring?
sentences.chinese: 口腔矫治器能减少上腭振颤和舌根鼾症？

sentences.english: Zheng Jie serves in her semifinal match against Justine Henin January 28.
sentences.chinese: 郑其腭服务于她的半决赛对阵海宁1月28日。

sentences.english: The breadth of the rat palatal suture after each experiment phases was measured.
sentences.chinese: 测量每个实验步骤结束时腭中缝的宽度。

sentences.english: There were slight differences in arch perimeter and midpalatal suture separation.
sentences.chinese: 在牙弓的周长和腭中缝打开上略有差异。

sentences.english: Objective To observe whether repairing the hard palate can improve velopharyngeal function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腭板骨缺损修复对腭咽闭合的影响。

definition: vomer bone (in the nose, dividing the nostrils)
